css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,5,23,33),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:3px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:3px;border-left-width:0px;min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);z-index:3;padding-top:28px;padding-bottom:30px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:20px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,5,23,33),1);border-top-width:3px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:3px;border-left-width:0px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:-3px;bottom:-3px;left:0px;right:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u nav .wp-block-navigation__responsive-container.has-modal-open .wp-block-navigation__responsive-close ul{-moz-column-gap: initial; column-gap: initial; row-gap: initial;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u .wp-block-navigation__responsive-container.has-modal-open .wp-block-navigation__responsive-close .wp-block-navigation__submenu-container{padding:0px 10px 0;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u .wp-block-navigation__responsive-container.has-modal-open .wp-block-navigation__responsive-close{padding:2rem 5%;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u{padding-top:50px;padding-bottom:50px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-33704b0b-u{padding-top:10px;padding-bottom:10px;}}
